original_text: “But as the time of the promise drew near, which God had granted to Abraham, the people increased and multiplied in Egypt
korean_text: 하나님이 아브라함에게 약속하신 때가 가까우매 이스라엘 백성이 애굽에서 번성하여 많아졌더니

sentences.original_text: But as the time of the promise drew near
which God had granted to Abraham
the people increased and multiplied in Egypt
